meanings.definition: The state or quality of being tepid.
meanings.sent1: The tepidities of the water made it unpleasant for swimming.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the tepidities of the room as soon as I walked in.
meanings.sent3: The tepidities of the soup were so unexciting that no one wanted a second bowl.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with tepidities, lacking any passion or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The tepidities of the lukewarm tea left a bland taste in my mouth.
